Text: Re POS Book FairThanks I work for a criminal defense lawyer and he thought of the address name Pretty appropriate When you get a chance let me know what and how much you will be baking I work on Mondays Wednesdays and Fridays so if you send anything out on Tuesday and Thursday please send it to my home email address Thanks again Lynda Original Message From To Sent Monday October PM Subject RE POS Book Fair Love your email address Im glad you got my email it was working kind of funny so I wasnt sure it went through Count me in from or from if you need that shift instead Michelle Original Message From Randy Schaffer ENRON Sent Monday October PM To Cash Michelle Cc Subject POS Book Fair Hi Michelle Lynda Carnegie here I received your message and email Ive got you down for baked goods and we will need your help at the book fair What time would you like to work during family night We have one person from to and another from to but we will need more than one person at those times Let me know You can email me at work at File mailto or at home at File mailto Thanks for your help Lynda C This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
